page.title: 12Myself in ten years time
page.content: I would like to stay on at school until I am eighteen years old because I want to take my examinations. Then I would like to go to college so that I could get a job as a policewoman perhaps. I would like to be happily married with three children, one boy and two girls. I wouldn't get married or have children until I'd worked long enough to save up some money and get my own place to live. I would probably have to get a flat because I wouldn't be able to afford a house straight away. If I couldn't be a policewoman I'd like to be a secretary and work in an office, because I like writing and things like that. I would like my husband to be a man who shares things and who is kind to our children. We would go shopping together on Saturdays and we would share other jobs as well.
